name: stardust
short_effect: Sell for 1000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 2000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Beautiful red sand.
Can be sold at a
high price.

silky feel.
It can be sold at a high price.

price to shops.
